statements: DELETE FROM energy_distribution_data WHERE energy_consumed < 100 AND location_id = 3;
DELETE FROM historical_energy_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM historical_energy_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND energy_consumption < 100
DELETE FROM energy_optimization WHERE timestamp <= '2022-09-30' AND optimization_details LIKE '%peak hours%'
DELETE FROM energy_consumers WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM energy_sources WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM energy_distribution WHERE timestamp = '2023-01-15' AND location = 'Main Building';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE peak_demand > 100 AND location = 'Building A';
DELETE FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE efficiency_type = 'overall' AND efficiency_score > 90.5;
